00014 #ifndef ARRAYTOOLS_H

00022 namespace ArrayTool {
00023 
00024 // Nice macros to have when sending arrays around.
00025 #define BEGIN_ARRAY(x) (x)
00026 #define END_ARRAY(x) ( (x) + (sizeof(x)/sizeof((x)[0]) ) )
00027 
00080 template<class T, class S> 
00081 T* reallocate( T* buf, uint32 nbrElems, uint32 newAllocSize, 
00082                S& allocSize) {
00083    T* newBuf = NULL;
00084    if ( newAllocSize > 0 )
00085       newBuf = new T[newAllocSize];
00086    if ( buf != NULL && newBuf != NULL ) {
00087       uint32 nbr =  std::min(nbrElems, newAllocSize);
00088       for(uint32 i = 0; i < nbr; ++i ) {
00089          newBuf[i] = buf[i];
00090       }
00091    }
00092    // Call destructor for the leftover elements.
00093    delete [] buf;
00094    allocSize = newAllocSize;
00095                
00096    return newBuf;
00097 }
00098 
00110 template<class T, class S>
00111 T* addElement(T* buf, const T& elem, S& nbrElems, 
00112                      S& allocSize) {
00113    if ( nbrElems >= allocSize ) {
00114       if ( allocSize > 0 ) 
00115          buf = reallocate(buf, nbrElems, allocSize * 2, allocSize);
00116       else
00117          buf = reallocate(buf, nbrElems, 1, allocSize);
00118    }
00119                
00120    buf[nbrElems++] = elem;
00121    return buf;
00122 }
00123             
00135 template<class T, class S>
00136 T* addElement(T* buf, const T& elem, S& nbrElems) {
00137    uint32 allocSize = nbrElems;
00138    buf = reallocate(buf, nbrElems, allocSize + 1, allocSize);
00139    buf[nbrElems++] = elem;
00140 
00141    return buf;
00142 }
00143             
00144 
00151 template<class T, class S>
00152 void removeElement(T* buf, uint32 idx, S& size) {
00153    if (idx != uint32(size - 1)) {
00154       // Copy the element to be removed to a new buffer.
00155       byte* removedElemBuf = new byte[sizeof(T)];
00156       memcpy(removedElemBuf, buf + idx, sizeof(T));
00157       // Move all elements after the removed element
00158       // one step forward.
00159       memmove(buf + idx, 
00160               buf + idx + 1, 
00161               (size - idx - 1) * sizeof(T));
00162       // Copy the removed element to the last position in
00163       // the array.
00164       memcpy(buf + size - 1, removedElemBuf, sizeof(T));
00165       delete[] removedElemBuf;
00166    }
00167    size--;
00168 }
